alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Graham and southeastern Greenlee Counties through 1245 AM MST... At 1200 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southeast of Solomon, or 19 miles west of Virden, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... York and Guthrie. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 354 and 376. Route 75 between mile markers 383 and 397. Route 191 between mile markers 139 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
